DESCRIPTION: Secure, private, open-source, and fast. Don't choose one of them, choose all of them.
VERIFICATION_DESCRIPTION: Are you a human? We're sure you are, but we need to make sure.
LOGGED_IN: You have logged in successfully. Please wait while you are redirected to your destination.
ALREADY_LOGGED_IN: You are already logged in. Please wait while you are redirected to your destination.
ENTER_CODE: Please enter the verification code generated by your authenticator app.
WEAK_PASSWORD: Password is too weak, please add a variety of characters
INVALID_USERNAME: Usernames must be 3-32 characters long and can only contain Latin letters, numbers, underscores, hyphens, and periods
LONG_DISPLAY_NAME: Display name must be 64 characters or less
SESSION_EXPIRED: Session expired, please reload the page
TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: Too many attempts, please try again later
UNKNOWN_ERROR: An unknown error occurred, please try again later
TIMED_OUT: Unable to reach the server, please try again later
ALREADY_EXISTS: An account with this email already exists
